skill.name: aeon
skill.description: This skill should be used for time series machine learning tasks including classification, regression, clustering, forecasting, anomaly detection, segmentation, and similarity search. Use when working with temporal data, sequential patterns, or time-indexed observations requiring specialized algorithms beyond standard ML approaches. Particularly suited for univariate and multivariate time series analysis with scikit-learn compatible APIs.

content.user_title: Learn aeon time series methods quickly
content.value_statement: Time series modeling is complex and tool choices are unclear. This skill provides clear guidance and examples for aeon workflows across key tasks.
actual_capabilities: Explain aeon classifiers and selection criteria
Describe aeon regressors and typical use cases
Outline clustering and similarity search methods
Provide forecasting and anomaly detection guidance
limitations: Requires the aeon Python package to run code
Does not load or access user data automatically
Examples assume data is already formatted for aeon
No training or evaluation is executed in this skill

output_examples.input: Help me choose a fast time series classifier for a small dataset
output: Recommend MiniRocketClassifier for strong speed and accuracy
Validate with a simple train validation split

best_practices: Start with ROCKET variants before deep learning
Validate with a held out split and compare baselines
anti_patterns: Using deep models on very small datasets
Skipping normalization for distance based methods
Tuning many models without a baseline check

faq.question: Is this compatible with Python and scikit-learn?
faq.answer: Yes. Aeon uses scikit-learn compatible APIs and runs in Python environments.

faq.question: What data sizes work best?
faq.answer: Small to medium datasets suit distance and ROCKET methods. Deep learning needs larger datasets.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with existing sklearn pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes. Aeon transformers and estimators are designed to work in sklearn pipelines.

faq.question: Does this skill access my files or data?
faq.answer: No. It provides guidance and examples without accessing local files or data.

faq.question: What if results are poor?
faq.answer: Check normalization, try a simpler baseline, and tune key parameters like window size or kernels.

faq.question: How does this compare to generic ML tools?
faq.answer: Aeon provides time series specific models and distances that generic tools do not include.
